annotations: You just said , ah , secondly , we need to look at the new products , and thirdly , look at the new technology .
Uh , yes , I have also heard of such a professional voice , that there is not a lot of new technology in the Beijing car show this time .
I believe this can be seen dialectically .
Ah , eh , for any company to participate in an exhibition , first , its chief purpose in participating in this exhibition is to enter this market .

Within a period of time in the future , as the Chinese market , ah , with its spending trends , the direction of government policies , and the actual strength of national economic income , will all decide for the enterprise what type of technology and products they will showcase during this car exhibition .
So if we were to rate the Beijing Auto Show with other A - level exhibitions in the world , there was indeed a technological difference , difference .

But on the other hand , looking at the future of China 's consumer market , I think the new technology brought to this car show is sufficient for us Chinese , Chinese who are in the auto industry to learn , eh , to catch up and to surpass .
